Package data.automaton.implementations

Class SimpleDFA

java.lang.Object
data.automaton.implementations.SimpleDFA
All Implemented Interfaces:
DFA
public class SimpleDFA extends Object implements DFA
This class is a simple implementation of the DFA interface. It represents a DFA and is immutable after creation.
